description: Building Civil Society Support for Biodiversity Conservation through Environment Resource Networking

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
1.Capacity building of focal teachers and district education officers and instutionalization of nature clubs
2.Nature club hand books developed
3. Development of Environment Education modules fo rthe 2 college of Paro and Samtse
4. Action Grant support  to schools
5. World Environment Day celebration supported
6. Local Conservation Support groups formed
subproject.title: Increased society engagement
